description: The function 'create_fixed_step_number_line' generates a number line with a fixed step size. It is designed to provide a visual aid for understanding concepts related to number lines, intervals, and divisions. The function allows for customization of the number line's range, step size, and minor divisions, making it a versatile tool for teaching various mathematical concepts.

stimulus_type_specification.title: Available Images: Fixed Step Number Line
stimulus_type_specification.description: The function 'create_fixed_step_number_line' can draw a number line with specified range, step size, and minor divisions. It accepts inputs based on the stimulus description class 'FixedStepNumberLine', which includes the range of the number line, the step size for major ticks, and the number of minor divisions between major ticks. The function ensures that the number line includes a buffer of 10% of the total range on both ends. The educational purpose of this function is to provide a visual representation of number lines, which can be used to teach concepts such as intervals, fractions, and divisions.

details: range: Defines the minimum and maximum values of the number line
step_size: Specifies the distance between major ticks on the number line
minor_divisions: Determines the number of minor divisions between major ticks
The range must be defined with a minimum and maximum value
The step size must be a positive number
The number of minor divisions must be a positive integer
The function draws a number line with major and minor ticks
The number line includes a buffer of 10% of the total range on both ends
The position and number of ticks are determined by the input parameters

educational_standards.description: Round to the nearest 10 or 100 using the number line.
Graph a fraction or mixed number on a number line that is labelled with decimals to the tenths place.
